attributes.title: Call Center Operator
attributes.description:
## Call Center Agent Job Description
This job involves performing excellent customer service and communication with clients.
In other words, the main tasks of call center agents are to provide product and service information to clients, provide customer support, product promotion, and deal with reports.
We expect you to be sociable and friendly. Our ideal call center agent has a good command of English, knows how to get along with clients, and is always ready to help and strike the happy medium in communication
## Call center operator job
If you haven’t had experience in this field before, don’t fall into despair. We understand that employees need time to adapt to a new working environment. Therefore, we are ready to provide on-the-job training, round-the-clock support, and help for our newcomers.

We are ready to present a great opportunity to try yourself in written communication in the lead generation department.
## Benefits of working for RemotEmployees
We are not an ordinary call center where you deal with negative customer feedback. Our clients are the mirror of our company and service.
RemotEmployees is an [outstaffing company](/about), looking for foreign customers and employing candidates from the IT and Marketing fields. We don’t have plenty of unanswered calls or messages because we discuss all the details and schedule meetings in advance.
You will not only gain invaluable work experience but also improve your English communication skills in our company.
The position of an agent in a call center has an outlook for career growth, the possibility of working in another department, and even the opportunity to work on foreign projects.
Are you willing to become a part of our close-knit team? If so, then leave your contacts below, and we will contact you within a week!
.
* PC and high-speed Internet
* Advanced Microsoft Office skills 
* English (B1 +) level
* Database experience will be an advantage.
* Affability and diligence.
attributes.subTitle: Vacancy for a remote position
attributes.cardDescription: RemotEmployees company needs a Call Center Agent for remote work. No experience is required. Knowledge of English at B1 level or above is essential.
